title: 107_s2791
content: Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to establish spending caps for FY 2003. Extends spending caps and budget flexibility among defense programs through FY 2007. Extends other deficit elimination provisions through FY 2011. Amends the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to extend budget enforcement mechanisms in the Senate, including supermajority requirements, allocations filings, and points of order concerning advanced appropriations and pay-as-you-go (PAYGO). Prohibits diversions from the Crime Victims Fund.
